title: Attempting to Reconnect
body: I have 23-30ms ingame, FPS is fine, internet is fine, but for some reason I keep getting "Attempting to Reconnect" in game . made me lose LP.

replies.body: same, but riot doesnt want to help

This is a two month old thread, and more than likely entirely unrelated to any issues you are currently experiencing. Are you in NSW and with Telstra? In which case it is a known issue that Mindstar (Riot) has been providing updates for when he has them:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/bPfLvjTR-network-issues-telstra
